Package gw.api.domain.invoice

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChargeEntryContainer
    Common interface for classes that allow for manual addition and modification of invoice items on a charge.
    ChargeSlicer
    A ChargeSlicer slices charges into invoice items.
    InvoiceItemExceptionContext
    Provides information useful to implementers of the IInvoiceItem plugin.
    InvoicePayer
    An InvoicePayer is responsible for paying invoices.
    InvoiceStreamInvoicingSettingsProvider
    An InvoiceStreamInvoicingSettingsProvider provides invoicing settings used by invoice streams, such as invoicing days and invoicing lead time.
    InvoicingOverridable
    Implementors of this interface will have an OverridingPayer property and an OverridingInvoiceStream property.
    PaymentPlanModifierMethods
    Methods for classes that modify payment plans
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnchorDate
    An AnchorDate is the invoice day of month, invoice day of week, or every-other-week anchor date for an invoice stream.
    ArrayPropertyUtil
    This class serves the ArrayProperties in ChargeInitializer and ChangeInstallmentChanger.
    BoundedDateSequence
    A BoundedDateSequence is a DateSequence that contains only a limited set of dates -- it is not infinite.
    BoundedDateSequence.BoundedDateSequenceIterator  
    ChargeInstallmentChanger
    The sole authority on changing Invoice Items that are on "initialized" charges (charges whose BillingInstruction has been executed.)
    CompositeDateSequence
    A CompositeDateSequence groups other date sequences into one composite date sequence.
    DateNudger
    A DateNudger is a Function that nudges one date to another date.
    DateSequence
    A DateSequence is an ordered list of dates.
    IntervalBoundedDateSequence
    An IntervalBoundedDateSequence decorates another DateSequence to constrain the dates to be within a specified DateInterval.
    InvoiceAssembler
    An InvoiceAssembler assembles invoices from invoice items by placing invoice items onto the invoices that are appropriate for those items.
    InvoiceItemExceptionEvent
    Defines the event that caused the IInvoiceItem.updateExceptionInfo plugin method to be called.
    InvoiceItemPayers
    Specifies a mapping between InvoiceItem and InvoicePayer.
    InvoiceItemPlacements
    Wrapper of a map of InvoiceItems to Invoices to aid in assembling invoices.
    InvoiceSpecification
    An InvoiceSpecification matches invoices that satisfy its criteria.
    InvoiceStreamFactory
    InvoiceStreamFactory creates InvoiceStreams.
    InvoiceStreams
    Methods that operate on groups of InvoiceStreams.
    ListDateSequence
    A ListDateSequence is a date sequence that contains a given set of dates in increasing order (i.e., from earliest/oldest to newest/latest/most-recent).
    MonthlyDateSequence
    A MonthlyDateSequence is a periodic sequence of dates where the length of each period is some number of months.
    NudgedDateSequence
    A NudgedDateSequence decorates another DateSequence to nudge the dates of the underlying sequence.
    PaymentPlanChanger
    Class that manages changing the payment plan on a PolicyPeriod.
    PaymentPlanModifierMethodsImpl
    PaymentPlanModifierMethodsImpl is an abstract superclass for implementations of PaymentPlanModiferMethods.
    PaymentRedistributer
    Class to hold the shared code between PaymentPlanChanger and ChargeInstallmentChanger to reapply reversed payment amounts after the changes have taken place.
    PeriodicDateSequence
    A PeriodicDateSequence is a date sequence in which the dates occur once per period.
    ShiftedDateSequence
    A ShiftedDateSequence decorates another DateSequence to shift the dates later by the specified number of days.
    WeeklyDateSequence
    A WeeklyDateSequence is a periodic sequence of dates where the length of each period is some number of weeks.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PaymentHandlingDuringPaymentPlanChange
    Indicates what to do with existing payments during a payment plan change
    ReversePaymentsWhenMovingInvoiceItem
    Indicates when to reverse a payment if the invoice item it pays is moved
